documentation.text: @dev Proposal for ERC1238 token with storage based token URI management.
@dev Sets `_tokenURI` as the token URI for the tokens of type `id`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC1238Storage: ids and token URIs length mismatch"

arguments.value: ERC1238Storage: ids and token URIs length mismatch

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC1238Storage: ids and token URIs length mismatch"

documentation.text:
@dev Deletes the tokenURI for the tokens of type `id`.
 Requirements:
  - A token URI must be set.
  Possible improvement:
  - The URI can only be deleted if all tokens of type `id` have been burned.
@dev Returns whether a tokenURI is set or not for a specific `id` token type.

devdoc.details: Proposal for ERC1238 token with storage based token URI management.

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1238-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.
